properties.title: Habsburg Castle
properties.abstract: Discover the ancestral seat of the Habsburgs from where they set off to conquer the world! You will gain an insight into the day-to-day life in the castle, can enjoy a fascinating tour and treat yourself to culinary delights in a historic setting.
properties.description:
Habsburg Castle was founded in 1030 and originates from the beginnings of the Habsburg dynasty. The dual castle was the home of the most successful family in the Aargau region which, after its glittering rise in the late Middle Ages, went on to rule an empire with huge estates in Europe and colonies in America, Asia and Africa.

Today, you can gain an insight into life in the castle in a small exhibition at this historic showpiece and learn some interesting facts about the history of the structure and the settlement. How did people feed themselves at the time of the Habsburgs? How was the water supply secured? And how did people at that time live in the castle?

Immerse yourself into the medieval ruins into the world of the Habsburgs and marvel at their stories.
